cast: Cast : Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore, Edward Burns
movie_description: Summary : Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

cast: Cast : Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Giorgio Cantarini, Giustino Durano
movie_description: Summary : When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

cast: Cast : Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay, Emilia Fox
movie_description: Summary : A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

cast: Cast : Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid, Claude Rains
movie_description: Summary : A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

cast: Cast : Tsutomu Tatsumi, Ayano Shiraishi, Akemi Yamaguchi, Yoshiko Shinohara
movie_description: Summary : A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

cast: Cast : Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Eli Roth, Mélanie Laurent
movie_description: Summary : In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

cast: Cast : Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando, Robert Duvall, Frederic Forrest
movie_description: Summary : A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

cast: Cast : Aleksey Kravchenko, Olga Mironova, Liubomiras Laucevicius, Vladas Bagdonas
movie_description: Summary : After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

movie_name: Title : Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
cast: Cast : Peter Sellers, George C. Scott, Sterling Hayden, Keenan Wynn
movie_description: Summary : An insane American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

cast: Cast : Jürgen Prochnow, Herbert Grönemeyer, Klaus Wennemann, Hubertus Bengsch
movie_description: Summary : A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.

cast: Cast : Kirk Douglas, Ralph Meeker, Adolphe Menjou, George Macready
movie_description: Summary : After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

cast: Cast : Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard, Jack Oakie, Reginald Gardiner
movie_description: Summary : Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

cast: Cast : Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau, Patrick McGoohan, Angus Macfadyen
movie_description: Summary : Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

cast: Cast : Matthew Modine, R. Lee Ermey, Vincent D'Onofrio, Adam Baldwin
movie_description: Summary : A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

cast: Cast : Lubna Azabal, Mélissa Désormeaux-Poulin, Maxim Gaudette, Mustafa Kamel
movie_description: Summary : Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

cast: Cast : Peter O'Toole, Alec Guinness, Anthony Quinn, Jack Hawkins
movie_description: Summary : The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

cast: Cast : Spencer Tracy, Burt Lancaster, Richard Widmark, Marlene Dietrich
movie_description: Summary : In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

cast: Cast : Sidharth Malhotra, Kiara Advani, Shiv Panditt, Pranay Pachauri
movie_description: Summary : Shershaah is the story of PVC awardee Indian soldier Capt. Vikram Batra, whose bravery and unflinching courage in chasing the Pakistani soldiers out of Indian territory contributed immensely in India finally winning the Kargil War in 1999.

movie_name: Title : Ayla: The Daughter of War
cast: Cast : Çetin Tekindor, Ismail Hacioglu, Kyung-jin Lee, Kim Seol
movie_description: Summary : Sergeant Süleyman finds a little girl on a battlefield during the Korean War. He takes her and names her Ayla. Fifteen months later, Süleyman's brigade is told they will be returning to Turkey, and he is reluctant to leave her behind.

cast: Cast : Dean-Charles Chapman, George MacKay, Daniel Mays, Colin Firth
movie_description: Summary : April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

cast: Cast : Ivana Baquero, Ariadna Gil, Sergi López, Maribel Verdú
movie_description: Summary : In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

directors: Director : Victor Fleming, George Cukor, Sam Wood
cast: Cast : Clark Gable, Vivien Leigh, Thomas Mitchell, Barbara O'Neil
movie_description: Summary : A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

cast: Cast : Bruno Ganz, Alexandra Maria Lara, Ulrich Matthes, Juliane Köhler
movie_description: Summary : Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

cast: Cast : Steve McQueen, James Garner, Richard Attenborough, Charles Bronson
movie_description: Summary : Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

cast: Cast : Tatsuya Nakadai, Akira Terao, Jinpachi Nezu, Daisuke Ryû
movie_description: Summary : In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

movie_name: Title : To Be or Not to Be
cast: Cast : Carole Lombard, Jack Benny, Robert Stack, Felix Bressart
movie_description: Summary : During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

cast: Cast : Vicky Kaushal, Paresh Rawal, Mohit Raina, Yami Gautam
movie_description: Summary : Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

cast: Cast : Masayuki Mori, Machiko Kyô, Kinuyo Tanaka, Mitsuko Mito
movie_description: Summary : A tale of ambition, family, love, and war set in the midst of the Japanese Civil Wars of the sixteenth century.

cast: Cast : Caglar Ertugrul, Ufuk Bayraktar, Ahu Türkpençe, Murat Serezli
movie_description: Summary : In a desolate war zone where screams of the innocent echo, seven Maroon Berets will dance with death on the very line between disaster and valor.

cast: Cast : Andrew Garfield, Sam Worthington, Luke Bracey, Teresa Palmer
movie_description: Summary : World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, serving during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

cast: Cast : Robert De Niro, Christopher Walken, John Cazale, John Savage
movie_description: Summary : An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

movie_name: Title : The Bridge on the River Kwai
cast: Cast : William Holden, Alec Guinness, Jack Hawkins, Sessue Hayakawa
movie_description: Summary : British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

cast: Cast : Charlie Sheen, Tom Berenger, Willem Dafoe, Keith David
movie_description: Summary : Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

cast: Cast : Ryan O'Neal, Marisa Berenson, Patrick Magee, Hardy Krüger
movie_description: Summary : An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

cast: Cast : Don Cheadle, Sophie Okonedo, Joaquin Phoenix, Xolani Mali
movie_description: Summary : Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

movie_name: Title : The Best Years of Our Lives
cast: Cast : Myrna Loy, Dana Andrews, Fredric March, Teresa Wright
movie_description: Summary : Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

movie_name: Title : All Quiet on the Western Front
cast: Cast : Lew Ayres, Louis Wolheim, John Wray, Arnold Lucy
movie_description: Summary : A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.

cast: Cast : Predrag 'Miki' Manojlovic, Lazar Ristovski, Mirjana Jokovic, Slavko Stimac
movie_description: Summary : Two underground black marketeers, Marko and Blacky, sell weapons to the Communist resistance in wartime Belgrade, living the good life along the way.

cast: Cast : Brahim Hadjadj, Jean Martin, Yacef Saadi, Samia Kerbash
movie_description: Summary : In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

cast: Cast : Anthony Quinn, Irene Papas, Michael Ansara, Johnny Sekka
movie_description: Summary : This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.

cast: Cast : Buster Keaton, Marion Mack, Glen Cavender, Jim Farley
movie_description: Summary : After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines.

cast: Cast : Lino Ventura, Paul Meurisse, Jean-Pierre Cassel, Simone Signoret
movie_description: Summary : An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.

cast: Cast : Jean Gabin, Dita Parlo, Pierre Fresnay, Erich von Stroheim
movie_description: Summary : During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are eventually sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress.

cast: Cast : Biljana Cekic, Zlatan Vidovic, Anja Stanic, Luka Saranovic
movie_description: Summary : A 10-year-old girl and her family come face-to-face with the horrors of the Holocaust when they are sent to a concentration camp in Croatia. She must summon the courage to protect herself and her infant brother while trying to escape.

cast: Cast : Lembit Ulfsak, Elmo Nüganen, Giorgi Nakashidze, Misha Meskhi
movie_description: Summary : In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man Ivo has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo takes him in.

cast: Cast : Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley, Matthew Goode, Allen Leech
movie_description: Summary : During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.

cast: Cast : Donnie Yen, Simon Yam, Siu-Wong Fan, Ka-Tung Lam
movie_description: Summary : During the Japanese invasion of China, a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home when his city is occupied. With little means of providing for themselves, Ip Man and the remaining members of the city must find a way to survive.

cast: Cast : Chiara Mastroianni, Catherine Deneuve, Gena Rowlands, Danielle Darrieux
movie_description: Summary : A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.

cast: Cast : William Holden, Don Taylor, Otto Preminger, Robert Strauss
movie_description: Summary : After two Americans are killed while escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

cast: Cast : Jasna Djuricic, Izudin Bajrovic, Boris Ler, Dino Bajrovic
movie_description: Summary : Aida is a translator for the UN in the small town of Srebrenica. When the Serbian army takes over the town, her family is among the thousands of citizens looking for shelter in the UN camp.
